title: Data Migration Lead Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at ALIGHT
Interview Descriptions: Fue una entrevista corta donde me preguntaron conocimientos en excel, en datos, en SAP y en hrx. El proceso de seleccion fue largo pero me fueron comunicando en todo momento, por lo que se hizo muy ameno. RRHH fue siempre muy claro en todo.
Interview Questions: Que experiencia tengo con sap y hrx?

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Interview Descriptions: questions 10 whay are you gere, what pay perfer, past jobs, whats your weakness whats your strength what are you doing new when can you start. the onterviewer takes notes while you aswer no interaction just blank face when asking

title: Supply Chain Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at ALIGHT (Khartoum) in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Interview started in-time via online app. Professional Interviewers in terms of interview process and enriched expertise of recruitment position. All aspects of Job Description on Vacancy were asked. Follow-up questions raised by interviewers when necessary.
Interview Questions: What challenge/learning do you think that you would be required once you joined the position?

title: GCO- Global Connections Officer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at ALIGHT in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Casual, Relaxed, Friendly, Interactive, Informative. The meeting was over zoom. The recruiter took notes and most questions were posed by the department manager. It lasted about 45 minutes. They were early in the process and I have not heard back yet for a second round.

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at ALIGHT
Interview Descriptions: I was asked to complete 4 rounds interviews which took at least 1 full month to complete. I would take time off to attend these interviews, review material on my own time, send follow up emails --- only to be completely ghosted after the last interview. The hiring manager had been following up within a day or two of each step previously, so it was obvious they were avoiding me after that. It took several follow up attempts to finally hear back that they were going in a different direction. I completely respected the decision, just found it very unprofessional in the manner it was handled.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this role? Please explain your previous experiences and how it links to this position.

title: Logistics Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at ALIGHT (Bugesera, Kigali) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview had many questions about the role of the logistics coordinator and the support to the programmes. It was worth the experience since it was a professional interview with role playing.
Interview Questions: Are you available to work in every office where there is a need?

title: Program Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at ALIGHT (Islamabad, Islamabad) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions: I have been called for interview as a shortlisted candidate. The position was advertised in a news paper but some colleague also let me know about the opportunity who was already working in the company. He was not among the interview panel. they were not biased about the selection of candidate.
Interview Questions: they gave two questions related to my work for which i had to write 250 words. The question was about my skills in development sector
